perturbation.original_text: Company agrees to provide its services, as defined in Attachment A, in accordance with all applicable laws and in accordance with standards of decorum and taste so as not to adversely reflect upon the Association or its mission.
perturbation.changed_text: Company will endeavor to provide its services, as generally described in Attachment A, while considering applicable laws and standards of decorum and taste, striving not to significantly reflect negatively upon the Association or its mission.
perturbation.explanation: The original text imposes a clear obligation to comply with 'all applicable laws.' The modified text weakens this obligation by using 'endeavor to,' 'generally described,' 'considering applicable laws' instead of strict accordance, and 'striving not to significantly reflect negatively,' thus creating ambiguity about the level of compliance required. This change can lead to potential non-compliance, as it introduces subjective interpretation.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and definite obligations.

perturbation.original_text: All products, materials, services or other items of Company with which the Association Marks are used shall be maintained throughout the period of this Agreement at or above their quality at the beginning of the term. Company shall provide to the Association on a quarterly basis two (2) samples of any items or materials that contain the Association Marks.
perturbation.changed_text: Products, materials, services, or other items of Company with which the Association Marks are used should generally maintain a comparable quality to their state at the beginning of the term. Company may, at its discretion, provide the Association with samples of items or materials that contain the Association Marks periodically.
perturbation.explanation: The original text imposes a definite obligation to maintain quality and provide quarterly samples. The modified text weakens this by using 'should generally maintain a comparable quality,' and 'may, at its discretion, provide...periodically.' This introduces ambiguity and makes enforcement difficult, as the quality standard and frequency of sample provision are now subjective.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General contract law principles requiring clear and definite obligations.

perturbation.original_text: Each Party shall take measures it deems necessary to assure that none of the material which is prepared, or which shall be prepared, pursuant to this Agreement, violates or infringes upon any trademark or copyright, or any other right of any person, company or other entity. Both Parties shall protect against infringement of the Association Marks. Each Party shall provide reasonable assistance to the other party in protecting the Association Marks upon request. Each Party shall notify the other party immediately if it learns of any infringement of the Association Marks or Company.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party should consider taking measures it deems appropriate to address the possibility that the material which is prepared, or which may be prepared, pursuant to this Agreement, could potentially violate or infringe upon any trademark or copyright, or any other right of any person, company or other entity. Both Parties may consider protecting against infringement of the Association Marks. Each Party may offer assistance to the other party in protecting the Association Marks as reasonably feasible. Each Party will endeavor to notify the other party in a timely fashion if it becomes aware of a possible infringement of the Association Marks or Company.
perturbation.explanation: The original text imposes a clear obligation to take measures to assure no infringement, protect against infringement, provide reasonable assistance, and notify immediately. The modified text weakens this by using 'should consider,' 'deems appropriate,' 'could potentially,' 'may consider,' 'may offer assistance,' 'reasonably feasible,' and 'endeavor to notify in a timely fashion.' This introduces ambiguity and subjectivity, making enforcement difficult, as the level of effort and timing are now open to interpretation.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Federal Trademark Law (Lanham Act), which requires trademark holders to actively protect their marks.
